thumb.title: foe in the mirror / ft. ついなちゃん
thumb.description: from album「ROSE OF SHARON」bandcamp: https://leshymusic.bandcamp.com/album/rose-of-sharon■ 作詞・作曲：Leshy-P ( https://x.com/leshy_music )■ vocal：ついなちゃん■ art：バルダチョクヌトスティ歌詞:When I look in the mirrorI can't stand myselfWhen I try to be betterI touch my faceMy arms, my legs, my hairJust give me reason to breath airAnd the reflection will drag me through the Looking GlassThe happy place where people lying on green grassI see the foe in the mirrorShe touches my faceI see the foe in the mirrorShe has no graceI see the foe in the mirrorShe wants my placeI see the foe in the mirrorWith my face

tags.tag: ついなちゃんオリジナル曲
